metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12972 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.32. There is a heap-based buffer over-read in _bfd_doprnt in bfd.c because elf_object_p in elfcode.h mishandles an e_shstrndx section of type SHT_GROUP by omitting a trailing '\0' character.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.34-5ubuntu1').
